name: gqlb-comparison
description: Real-world comparison of GraphQL query builder approaches

scripts.gen:all: npm run gen:gqlb && npm run gen:typed-builder
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gqlb && npm run build:typed-builder
scripts.compare:all: npm run compare:size && npm run compare:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf gqlb-approach/src/generated gqlb-approach/dist typed-builder-approach/src/generated typed-builder-approach/dist results
scripts.full-comparison: npm run clean && npm run gen:all && npm run build:all && npm run compare:all && npm run compare:report
